AT.name: Mario Kart™ 64
AT.description: Die Fortsetzung des gefeierten Super Mario Kart™ hatte ein großes Erbe anzutreten, doch Mario Kart™ 64 übertraf alle Erwartungen! Dieser Nintendo 64™-Hit elektrisierte die Reihe mit komplett dreidimensionalen Rennstrecken, führte beim Driften die Miniturbo-Technik ein, fügte Wario und Donkey Kong hinzu und brachte uns den jetzt schon legendären blauen Stachi-Panzer. Mario Kart 64 brachte auch die Einführung sehr beliebter Strecken wie Toad's Turnpike, Royal Raceway und Yoshi Valley mit sich, welche sich auch heute noch größter Beliebtheit in der Spielreihe erfreuen! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mario Kart™ 64
AU.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations! This Nintendo 64™ hit turbocharged the series with fully 3D courses, introduced the Mini Turbo technique to sliding, added Wario and Donkey Kong, and brought us the now infamous blue Spiny Shell. Mario Kart 64 also saw the introduction of favourite courses like Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley – still going strong in the series today! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mario Kart™ 64
BG.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations! This Nintendo 64™ hit turbocharged the series with fully 3D courses, introduced the Mini Turbo technique to sliding, added Wario and Donkey Kong, and brought us the now infamous blue Spiny Shell. Mario Kart 64 also saw the introduction of favourite courses like Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley – still going strong in the series today! BE.name: Mario Kart™ 64
BE.description: La suite du populaire Super Mario Kart™ était attendue au tournant et Mario Kart™ 64 a su dépasser toutes les attentes ! Ce classique de la Nintendo 64™ a apporté à la série des circuits en 3D, la technique du Mini Turbo afin de déraper. Il a aussi introduit Wario et Donkey Kong et a vu arriver la désormais célèbre carapace à épines. Mario Kart 64 a aussi vu l'introduction de circuits favoris tels que Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley, qui sont toujours autant appréciés aujourd'hui ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Mario Kart™ 64
CA.description: Put the pedal to the metal in this worthy successor to the Super NES® classic, Super Mario Kart®. With improved courses and a revolutionary head-to-head four-player mode, Mario Kart 64 is sure to win the heart of any race-driving fan. The game includes 20 different courses filled with dips, valleys, jumps, tunnels and bridges. Smooth, precise control will bring players back time and time again for freewheeling fun.

Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

ES.name: Mario Kart™ 64
ES.description: La secuela del aclamado Super Mario Kart™ lo tenía difícil para estar a la altura del original, pero ¡Mario Kart 64™ superó todas las expectativas! Este éxito de Nintendo 64™ mejoró la serie con circuitos en perfecto 3D, introdujo la técnica miniturbo para derrapar, añadió a Wario y a Donkey Kong, y nos trajo el ahora infame caparazón de pinchos. Mario Kart 64 también nos presentó por primera vez circuitos tan populares como Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway y Yoshi Valley, que siguen dando guerra hoy en día. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Mario Kart™ 64
IT.description: Per il seguito dell'acclamato Super Mario Kart™ essere all'altezza dell'originale non era un compito facile, ma Mario Kart™ 64 c'è riuscito oltre ogni aspettativa! Questo grande successo per Nintendo 64™ regalò alla serie circuiti interamente in 3D e la tecnica MiniTurbo per effettuare la derapata, introdusse Wario e Donkey Kong e ci presentò anche il famigerato Guscio spinoso blu. Mario Kart 64 presentò anche per la prima volta molte piste rimaste tra le più amate, come Toad's Turnpike, Royal Raceway e Yoshi Valley, che continuano ad essere popolari ancora oggi! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MT.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations! Mario Kart 64 also saw the introduction of favourite courses like Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley – still going strong in the series today! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Mario Kart™ 64
MX.description: Pisa al fondo el acelerador en este digno sucesor del clásico Super Mario Kart® para Super NES®. Con pistas mejoradas y un revolucionario modo multijugador en el que hasta cuatro jugadores podrán competir. Mario Kart 64 resulta un título indispensable para todo fanático de los juegos de carreras. Encontrarás 20 diferentes pistas con curvas, colinas, obstáculos, túneles y puentes. Con la facilidad y precisión en los controles querrás recorrer cada pista una y otra vez.

NO.name: Mario Kart™ 64
NO.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations! This Nintendo 64™ hit turbocharged the series with fully 3D courses, introduced the Mini Turbo technique to sliding, added Wario and Donkey Kong, and brought us the now infamous blue Spiny Shell. Mario Kart 64 also saw the introduction of favourite courses like Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley – still going strong in the series today! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Mario Kart™ 64
NL.description: De opvolger van het populaire Super Mario Kart™ had veel verwachtingen om waar te maken, en Mario Kart™ 64 slaagde daar ruimschoots in! Deze hit op de Nintendo 64™ gaf de serie een behoorlijke impuls met volledig 3-dimensionale racebanen, de introductie van slippen door middel van de mini-turbotechniek, de toevoeging van Wario en Donkey Kong, en ook het nu beruchte blauwe Spiny-schild komt uit dit spel. Mario Kart 64 introduceerde ook een aantal geliefde racebanen zoals Toad's Turnpike, Royal Raceway, en Yoshi Valley, die nog altijd in de spelserie te vinden zijn! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mario Kart™ 64
NZ.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations! This Nintendo 64™ hit turbocharged the series with fully 3D courses, introduced the Mini Turbo technique to sliding, added Wario and Donkey Kong, and brought us the now infamous blue Spiny Shell. Mario Kart 64 also saw the introduction of favourite courses like Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley – still going strong in the series today! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Mario Kart™ 64
PL.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations! This Nintendo 64™ hit turbocharged the series with fully 3D courses, introduced the Mini Turbo technique to sliding, added Wario and Donkey Kong, and brought us the now infamous blue Spiny Shell. Mario Kart 64 also saw the introduction of favourite courses like Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway and Yoshi Valley – still going strong in the series today! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mario Kart™ 64
PT.description: A sequela do aclamado Super Mario Kart™ tinha a pressão de estar à altura do original… e Mario Kart™ 64 superou todas as expectativas! Este sucesso da Nintendo 64™ ligou os máximos e brindou-nos com pistas totalmente em 3D, introduziu a técnica de Mini Turbo em derrapagens, adicionou o Wario e o Donkey Kong ao rol de personagens e trouxe-nos a terrível Carapaça de Espinhos! O Mario Kart 64 também nos apresentou pela primeira vez a pistas tais como Toad's Turnpike, Royal Raceway e Yoshi Valley. Pistas que ainda fazem das suas hoje em dia! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mario Kart™ 64
RU.description: У продолжения нашумевшей игры Super Mario Kart™ была довольно непростая задача — превзойти своего предшественника, но у Mario Kart™ 64 все получилось даже лучше, чем ожидалось! Эта популярная игра для системы Nintendo 64™ дала начало целой серии игр, а все благодаря ее трехмерным трассам, таким новинкам как добавление Mini Turbo (мини-турбо) техники к скольжению, появлению Варио и Донки Конга, а также голубого Панциря Колючника, имеющего дурную славу. В Mario Kart 64 также впервые были представлены излюбленные игроками трассы: Toad’s Turnpike, Royal Raceway и Yoshi Valley! Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Super Mario Kart™ had a lot to live up to, and Mario Kart™ 64 succeeded beyond all expectations!
